title: Mundo's invisible cleaver
body:
Hey guys, I just wanted to report an odd bug I encountered in my most recent league game.

I was playing bot lane as Caitlyn with a support Leona against a Varus and a support Mundo. One thing I noticed from the get-go was that Mundo looked a pale green instead of his regular purple. (He wasn't using any skins, even Mundo's normal splash art popped up in the load screen) Not a big deal, I thought, but as we laned we encountered an even stranger bug: Mundo's infected cleaver was completely invisible.

I don't have any recording device or anything so I don't have any proof to provide you guys. But everyone in my team noticed that his cleavers weren't showing up whenever he used his q, only the noise it makes once it hits you. We even discussed it in the all chat, though the guys on the other team said everything was fine on their end.

Just thought I'd report it because an invisible projectile is nearly impossible to dodge (Not even the animation of mundo throwing it appeared) and can prove to be a bad experience, even if it's rare.

replies.body:
Hey there! 

We're currently investigating this issue! Since you don't happen to have a video, would you mind attaching a copy of your r3d log from the game you were experiencing the invisible Mundo cleavers? 

Each file appears like this: [yyyy-mm-ddT15-40-03] _r3dlog.txt, where yyyy-mm-dd is the date of the match played.

You can find them here: C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Logs\Game - R3d Logs

Thanks so much!
I just hit this on 5.8.  I have a video.  http://youtu.be/N2bcR0NdX64 Log as well.
Here is a log of my game as well, hope it helps!
Err, sorry if this is a double post but I meant to post the above as a reply and it took me hours to realize I didn't.

I don't have a video either, but I was playing Twisted Treeline yesterday, and it was against a "Toxic" Mundo (so I can't confirm the color dis configuration) but the cleavers were invisible. I play a lot of Mundo but have never encountered this before. My teammates said they couldn't see them either. Wondering if it was a common problem or not. 
Edited: Added log, hope I did it right.

A person on the enemy team claimed my cleavers were invisible. Said I was exploiting, so I'm sure I got reported for it. I, personally, could see the cleavers, but since this is apparently a known issue, I figured I'd sent in the log.

Also, they were briefcases.

I honestly don't think it's a bug, I think it's some sort of cheating script that allows the player to throw invisible cleavers while hitting them accurately, As I don't see how any visual bug could cause this, As it's happened to me and my friend's last night as it happened to four of us..... and when we went to test into a custom game, We could see each other's cleavers just fine.
I believe either from leaguesharp or botsoflegends, any sort of scripting site... I believe there is some sort of script causing this, Which Riot would have to take furthur measures to patch these. It could be a bug, but high suspension that it's a cheating script.
I just played a game with this exact error. No one on my team could see mundo's cleavers at all. Here is the r3d log for that game.
Yeah, having the same issue with the invisible cleaver as well, highly annoying

This just happened to me with a Nid on the opposite team. She had the headhunter skin and if she threw a spear from the bush you could not see it and you would get a faint red outline half the time from the lane. other times it just wouldn't show up.
Yep. Was just report this one myself. Seems it applies to both ARAM and SR and with any skin Mundo is using.
